<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/portal/payment/customer/operationsreport"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generates the customer operations report as csv file and save in Documents.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"startDate":{"type":"string","description":"Start date","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"},"endDate":{"type":"string","description":"End date","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"},"credit":{"type":"boolean","description":"Include credit operations","nullable":true,"example":true},"withdrawal":{"type":"boolean","description":"Include withdrawal operations","nullable":true,"example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Parameters of the request for generating the report on client operations","title":"CustomerOperationsReportRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"URL to the csv report file","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"string"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"StringWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
